body_html:
I've built a conda package of PyTorch for Windows 10 x64, Anaconda3(Python 3.5/3.6) and CUDA 8.0.
Use this command to install if you want.

# for CPU only package (also for AMD and Intel Graphics since these GPUs are unsupported)
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch-cpu

# for Windows 10 and Windows Server 2016, CUDA 8
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch

# for Windows 10 and Windows Server 2016, CUDA 9
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda90

# for Windows 7/8/8.1 and Windows Server 2008/2012, CUDA 8
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch_legacy

Note that the support for sm_20 and sm_30 has been dropped, so some old cards can't use PyTorch any more.
If you fail to import torch, try to install it in a new virtual environment like this:

conda create -n test python=3.6
activate test

Use it with caution, the multiprocessing part is broken so you need to wrap the main code with the following code if you use GPU and DataLoader.

if __name__ == '__main__':

If you can understand Chinese, here is my tutorial.

body:
I've built a conda package of PyTorch for Windows 10 x64, Anaconda3(Python 3.5/3.6) and CUDA 8.0.
Use this command to install if you want. 
```Powershell
# for CPU only package (also for AMD and Intel Graphics since these GPUs are unsupported)
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch-cpu

# for Windows 10 and Windows Server 2016, CUDA 8
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch

# for Windows 10 and Windows Server 2016, CUDA 9
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda90

# for Windows 7/8/8.1 and Windows Server 2008/2012, CUDA 8
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch_legacy
```
Note that the support for `sm_20` and `sm_30` has been dropped, so some old cards can't use PyTorch any more.
If you fail to import torch, try to install it in a new virtual environment like this:
```CMD
conda create -n test python=3.6
activate test
```
Use it with caution, the multiprocessing part is broken so you need to wrap the main code with the following code if you use GPU and DataLoader.
```Python
if __name__ == '__main__':
```
If you can understand Chinese, here is my [tutorial](https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/26871672).
